sentences.en: And here lie the seeds of the whole subsequent upheaval.
sentences.cn: 这就包含着随之而来的全部变革的萌芽.

sentences.cn: 面对突入起来的变化, 城市大学完全改变了他的招生标准.

sentences.en: Having a baby will mean the greatest upheaval in your life.
sentences.cn: 有了孩子意味着你的生活要发生重大的变化。

sentences.en: He had three teenage children caught up in the campus upheaval.
sentences.cn: 他有三个不满二十岁的孩子卷入了校园里的动乱.

sentences.en: Her fears had always been on the alert for an upheaval.
sentences.cn: 她日夜提心吊胆,严防突变.

sentences.en: It was a violent political upheaval.
sentences.cn: 这是一场激烈的政治动乱.

sentences.en: Moving house causes such an upheaval.
sentences.cn: 搬家引起了这么大的变化.

sentences.en: Moving house is a major upheaval.
Obviously, the court had been profoundly influenced by the progressive upheaval.
sentences.cn: 显然, 法院已深受进步激变的影响.

sentences.en: Of course, political upheaval could unhinge all the above.
sentences.cn: 当然, 政治上的巨变可以使以上说的东西支离破碎.

sentences.en: The news, war, peace, famine, upheaval, the price per paper clip.

sentences.en: The political upheaval in Kenya has pushed tea prices higher.
sentences.cn: 肯尼亚政局动荡,导致茶叶价格上涨.

sentences.en: The upheaval is blamed for recent stock market volatility across the globe.
sentences.cn: 这次危机因为近期造成全球股票市场的不稳定而备受指责.

sentences.en: Today's upheaval undermines both these pillars at once.
sentences.cn: 今天的大动荡立刻侵蚀了这些支柱.

sentences.en: Upheaval is also the right world for the domestic transformation.
sentences.cn: 同时,剧变也是形容中国国内变化的恰当词汇.

sentences.en: Wherever there is political upheaval, invariably there are refugees.
sentences.cn: 哪里有政治动乱，哪里就一定有难民。
